amendment.description: Amendment no. 39 printed in the Congressional Record to make available $3.5 million to the Kurdish Human Rights Watch for the Kurdistan region of Iraq.

action.text: Mr. Callahan raised a point of order against the Filner amendment (A013). Mr. Callahan stated that the amendment violated clause 2a of rule XXI and constituted authorizations in an appropriations bill. The Chair sustained the point of order.
